content.name: iscsiPortal
content.description: Information about the iSCSI portals in the storage system.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the iscsiPortal instance.

attributes.name: ethernetPort
attributes.description: Ethernet port used by the iSCSI portal.

attributes.name: iscsiNode
attributes.description: iSCSI node used by the iSCSI portal.

attributes.name: ipAddress
attributes.description: IP address of the iSCSI portal.

attributes.name: netmask
attributes.description: IPv4 netmask for the network interface, if it uses an IPv4 address.

attributes.name: v6PrefixLength
attributes.description: IPv6 prefix length for the interface, if it uses an IPv6 address.

attributes.name: gateway
attributes.description: IPv4 or IPv6 gateway address for the network interface.

attributes.name: vlanId
attributes.description: Virtual Local Area Network (VLAN) identifier for the interface. The interface uses the identifier to accept packets that have matching VLAN tags. \u003Cp/> Values are 1 - 4094.

attributes.name: ipProtocolVersion
attributes.description: Indicates whether the iSCSI portal is over IPv4 or IPv6.

arguments.name: ethernetPort
arguments.description: Ethernet port used by the iSCSI portal.

arguments.name: ipAddress
arguments.description: IP address of the iSCSI portal.

arguments.name: netmask
arguments.description: IPv4 netmask for the network interface, if it uses an IPv4 address.

arguments.name: v6PrefixLength
arguments.description: IPv6 prefix length for the iSCSI portal, if it uses an IPv6 address.

arguments.name: vlanId
arguments.description: Ethernet virtual LAN identifier used for tagging iSCSI portal outgoing packets and for filtering iSCSI portal incoming packets. \u003Cp/> Values are 1 - 4094.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: Unique identifier of the iscsiPortal instance to modify.

arguments.name: ipAddress
arguments.description: IP address of the iSCSI portal.

arguments.name: netmask
arguments.description: IPv4 netmask for the network interface, if it uses an IPv4 address.

arguments.name: v6PrefixLength
arguments.description: IPv6 prefix length for the interface, if it uses an IPv6 address.

arguments.name: vlanId
arguments.description: Ethernet virtual LAN identifier used for tagging iSCSI portal outgoing packets and for filtering iSCSI portal incoming packets. \u003Cp/> Values are 1 - 4094. Empty string or null to unset.

arguments.name: gateway
arguments.description: Gateway of the iSCSI portal. Empty string to unset.

actions.description: Delete an iSCSI network portal. \u003Cp/> iSCSI network portal can not be deleted if there are active iSCSI sessions over it.
